description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Play the popular series of PC Shoot them up on your Xbox 360 with a specially updated HD version of the game. Fight along 5 infested levels of Aliens and try to survive.
